title: Land for sale in Gampaha - 1.5 km to Balummahara
details:
13.5 perch bare land for sale in a residential neighborhood in Gampaha.
Land situated in Oruthota Road just 1.5 km from the Colombo - Kandy main road (Balummahara Junction).
Ideal location to start a family, just 5 km to the Gampaha Town.
